title: null error?! unhappy face
body: so i was in promotions. first game was tragic as last pick was only picking mid from the get go and made it hard from the get go. second game won nicely. in queue for third game and as the queue popped and i clicked accept the net went out for about 20-30s. it comes back on and i am in champ select and i can chat fine and everything. my turn comes to select a champ then it's all like null error when i tried to select a champion and gg i get booted for not selecting a champ and there goes promos down the drain. no way to get that game undone anyhow?
